title: Community New Year Potluck
description: Join us for a wonderful community potluck to celebrate the New Year! Bring your favorite dish to share and let's welcome 2024 together. Family-friendly event with games and activities for kids.

title: Monthly Society Meeting
description: Regular monthly meeting to discuss society matters, budget updates, maintenance issues, and community improvements. All residents are encouraged to attend and participate in decisions affecting our community.

title: Yoga in the Park
description: Start your weekend with a relaxing yoga session in our community garden area. Suitable for all levels. Please bring your own mat and water bottle. Session led by certified instructor Lisa Thompson.

title: Kids' Movie Night
description: Family movie night featuring a popular animated film! Popcorn and drinks will be provided. Perfect opportunity for families to bond and kids to make new friends in the community.

title: Community Garden Workshop
description: Learn the basics of urban gardening and sustainable practices. We'll cover composting, seasonal planting, and organic pest control. Perfect for beginners and experienced gardeners alike!

title: Valentine's Day Community Dinner
description: Romantic dinner event for couples in our community. Three-course meal prepared by local catering service. Music, dancing, and a wonderful evening to celebrate love with your neighbors.

title: Fire Safety Workshop
description: Important safety workshop conducted by the local fire department. Learn about fire prevention, emergency procedures, and proper use of fire extinguishers. Mandatory for all committee members.

title: Book Club Launch Meeting
description: First meeting of our new community book club! We'll discuss book selection for the first quarter, meeting schedule, and logistics. Come with your favorite book recommendations!

title: Spring Cleaning Community Day
description: Annual community cleanup and beautification day! We'll be cleaning common areas, trimming plants, and doing small maintenance tasks. Lunch will be provided for all volunteers.

title: Holi Color Festival Celebration
description: Join us for a vibrant Holi celebration! Colors, music, traditional snacks, and lots of fun. Open to all residents and their families. Please wear old clothes that you don't mind getting colorful!
